draw.model

Interface ShapeChangedListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener

    public interface ShapeChangedListener
extends EventListener
    Listener interface for shape change events. Defines methods for reacting to addition, removal and changes of shapes.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    hp

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void shapeAdded(ShapeChangedEvent evt)
      React to addition of shapes to model.
      void shapeChanged(ShapeChangedEvent evt)
      React to changes of shapes in model.
      void shapeRemoved(ShapeChangedEvent evt)
      Reacts to removal of shapes from model.

    • Method Detail
